properties.title: The intrinsic size of the image. Display sizing is set via the Sizing controls.
Prevent this image from being easily downloaded.
Adds the loading='lazy' attribute to the image.
Adds the fetchpriority attribute to the image.
Enable this to set both min and max height and width settings.
The ID of the parent element to trigger the effects.
The ID of the parent element to trigger the transforms.
The ID of the parent element to trigger the filters.
